title: Sword Art Online: Hollow Realization – Deluxe Edition
body:
Sword Art Online: Hollow Realization – Deluxe Edition


Genres/Tags: RPG, Action RPG, Third-person, 3D, Japanese
Companies: Artdink / Bandai Namco Entertainment Europe
Languages: ENG/MULTI8
Original Size: 29.1 GB
Repack Size: from 6.9 GB [Selective Download]

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: MegaUp (Uploaded by Sylvano, NOT compatible with MultiUpload mirrors)
  • Filehoster: WorldSrc [Single Direct Link] (Upto 100MB/s, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Sword.Art.Online.Hollow.Realization.Deluxe.Edition-CODEX ISO release: codex-sword.art.online.hollow.realization.deluxe.edition.iso (31,199,526,912 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of optional languages you don’t need (English is included by default)
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 29.1 to 6.9~7.7 GB, depending on selected languages)
  • Installation takes: ~30 minutes on 8-cores CPU + SSD; ~1.5 hours on 4-cores CPU + HDD. Each additional language adds 5-15 minutes to installation time
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 42 GB (55 GB during installation)
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • ATTENTION! If you’re installing this repack under Windows 10, run setup with compatibility set to Windows 7

Game Description

2026, Sword Art: Origin, a new VRMMORPG has emerged. Kirito meets a mysterious NPC and receives a cryptic message. This game, though familiar to him, is not the same as the one he escaped years ago…

ORIGINAL STORYTELLING supervised by Reki Kawahara, creator of Sword Art Online.

MASSIVE EXPANSIVE WORLD with a stronger sense of adventure.

MULTIPLAYER MODE to enjoy the game with 3 other players.

FEELS LIKE ITS MMORPG ORIGINS thanks to MMORPG-like interface, 16-character teams and fierce raid Boss battles.

You can skip downloading of language packs you don’t need. English is included by default. Here is the list of optional files:

  • fg-optional-brazilian.bin
  • fg-optional-chinese.bin
  • fg-optional-french.bin
  • fg-optional-german.bin
  • fg-optional-italian.bin
  • fg-optional-korean.bin
  • fg-optional-spanish.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with German UI/Subtitles – skip all “optional” files, but download fg-selective-german.bin & all main files (01-10).
